titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to report biennially on actions taken to address areas of concern regarding the Department of Veterans Affairs in the High Risk List of the Government Accountability Office, and for other purposes.
Department of Veterans Affairs Oversight Enhancement Act of 2019
Department of Veterans Affairs Oversight Enhancement Act of 2019
Department of Veterans Affairs Oversight Enhancement Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations.
